titleStmt.title: The insatiate countesse A tragedie: acted at VVhite-Fryers. VVritten by Iohn Marston.
titleStmt.author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
Barksted, William, fl. 1611. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Thomas Archer, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head-Pallace, neere the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Probably drafted by John Marston and completed by William Barksted.
Variant: author's name cut out of title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
